subjectDescription: Discover a full suite of online business courses that will allow you to make better business decisions and succeed in today's competitive business world. Our courses provide a rich learning experience that will allow you to develop critical business skills in areas such as business... Read more...
title: Content Creation: Introduction 101
headline: Use your knowledge to create content and build a business to earn a passive income with this free online course.
description: Your skills, like your knowledge, are a business. Whatever you excel at, you can turn into an industry and earn money while assisting others in learning and mastering what you know. If you can understand how to utilise your expertise, you can work for yourself in your own time from the comfort of your own home, thus focusing and structuring your days around what you enjoy. Content creators do it daily and this course will show you how.

courseDescription:
The transition from written, text-based material in the twentieth century to today's visual and audio information has been tremendous. We are watching more videos than ever before: in the United States, 85% of Internet users watch video content every month. At the same time, traditional teaching methods are increasingly being phased out in favour of e-learning as more people become aware of its numerous benefits. The moment is ideal for monetising your knowledge and abilities by creating content.

This course aims to help you understand what a ‘content business’ is and how to generate money by establishing one. It starts by outlining the potential for passive income generation if you plan long term and treat knowledge like a business concept. You will explore and compare the advantages of the 'content industry' to other potential businesses in which you may be interested.

The following section will review how to record content and create videos. You will learn how to record videos utilising three different methods. You will also encounter the suggested equipment for beginners. The course then explains the role of thumbnails in improving the click-through rate. Learn to make a professional thumbnail in four steps with the best software programs and locate the best free software alternative. Enrol in this course to understand how to start a content creation business that can help you exploit your knowledge and generate passive income.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page
